name: AngularJS + Bootstrap Responsive Dashboard
description: This dashboard front-end was created as I was lacking a simple responsive but slick looking dashboard for another project of mine. Other free dashboards were bloated with external plugins and required a lot of hackery out of the box - plus the fact many were powered by jQuery. The design takes inspiration from other dashboards around, but the code to create the layout is my own. Feel free to chop it up as much as you want.

name: City Landing Page Template
description: The template is ideal for app websites, startups or anyone looking elegant one page landing page. Here are some of the features of this template.

name: Basic – Personal Page
description: ArrayBasic is a 2 pages themes created to showcase your work and basic information. Ideal for freelancers. Modern design, with an elegant aesthetic.       	SUBSCRIBE:   	        	     Share this:Share Twitter Facebook Pinterest   	SUBSCRIBE:

name: Landing Sumo Freebie – Landing Page
description: ArrayThis theme is a freebie provided by Landing Sumo. An awesome bundle of landing pages. A beautiful color combination and nice animations make this theme something you should have. Thanks to Landing Sumo!    	SUBSCRIBE:   	        	       	SUBSCRIBE:

name: DashGum – Free Dashboard
description: ArrayDashGum is a simple & elegant admin panel. It comes with 15 pages to start your panel as soon as possible. With DashGum you have charts, tables, a lot of panels, calendars, notifications, to do lists and more. Grab our free theme and enjoy it.If you need more, see our Premium Version with tons of features more. With 33 HTMLs and more than 40 plugins, the premium version comes with 4 different chart plugins, Email pages, Chat pages, maps, advanced forms and tables, file uploaders, inline editor, pricing tables, complete profile page and more.Premium Version    	SUBSCRIBE:   	        	     Share this:Share Twitter Facebook Pinterest   	SUBSCRIBE:

name: Solid – Multipurpose Theme
description: ArraySolid is a 7 pages theme ideal for web agencies and freelancers. Uses Font Awesome, Masonry Javascript, PrettyPhoto lightbox and nice hover effects thanks Codrops. Theme includes the Retina.js to work nice with retina display devices.  Update: August 3. Now you have the opportunity to grab our WordPress version thanks to GentsThemes. Take a look here: Solid WordPress Version   	SUBSCRIBE:

name: Instant – Personal Portfolio Theme
description: ArrayInstant is a 3 pages theme created specially for freelancers wanting to showcase their work with a nice and minimal style. Comes with an index/portfolio page, an about page and a project page. Easy to configure. Got your portfolio page in minutes.  Update: August 3. Now you have the opportunity to grab the Free WordPress version of Instant thanks to GentsThemes.com. Take a look here: Instant Free WordPress Theme   	SUBSCRIBE:

name: Studio – One Page Theme
description: ArrayStudio is a simple one page them, ideal for personal or agency site, comes with an elegant and minimal design. Uses Font Awesome 4.0.3, parallax effect, off-canvas menu & other handsome features.   	SUBSCRIBE:

name: Feedo – News Aggregator Theme
description: ArrayFeedo is a small theme designed to showcase the latest feeds from one or multiple sources. Uses SimplePie script to fetch the information. SimplePie is a very fast and easy-to-use feed parser, written in PHP.  This theme is a simplify version of a premium template.Please, read carefully the index.php comments inside the file, this will help you to modify and understand more the script. Also, If you have questions, you should check the script documentation.IF you want, you can purchase my premium theme here: FeedStrap – WrapBootstrap.Feeds for this demo are fetched from Sidebar.io (awesome site, you should check it)  	SUBSCRIBE:

name: Counter – Coming Soon Page
description: ArrayCounter is a simple coming soon theme. Uses Revolution Slider to showcase images at the background.  The countdown is powered by a custom Javascript. Modify that script to set the proper date.   	SUBSCRIBE:

name: Marco – One Page Theme
description: ArrayMarco is a stylish one page theme. Ideal for freelancers or agencies willing to show their work. Uses FontAwesome 4.0.3 & Animation.css.   	SUBSCRIBE:

name: Shield – One Page Theme
description: ArrayShield is an one page theme, ideal for agencies and freelancers. Elegant and with a fresh style. Uses the beautiful icomoon fonts.    	SUBSCRIBE:

name: Stanley – Freelancer Theme
description: ArrayStanley is a really simple theme for those wanting to showcase their work with a cute & clean style. Dribbble shots used in this theme are from the awesome designer David Creighton-PesterThanks to GentsThemes now STANLEY have their WordPress version available totally free.WordPress Theme Information: Click here Thanks to Arshad Chummun now STANLEY have their Drupal version available totally free.Drupal Theme Information: Click Here Thanks to Soumyabrata Ghosh now STANLEY have their Tumblr version available totally free.Tumblr Theme Information: Click here   	SUBSCRIBE:

name: Flatty – App Landing Page
description: ArrayFlatty is a flat landing page designed to show your next app, site or product. With a fresh style & minimal design, you can now show your product with style.   	SUBSCRIBE:

name: SMPL – A Simple Contact Page
description: ArrayA really simple theme to share your contact information and social links. SMPL uses font awesome 4.0.3 and a beautiful jscript to stretch correctly your image background.   	SUBSCRIBE:

name: Bolt – Flat One Page Theme
description: ArrayBolt is an elegant option to show your work and contact information. A clean design with focus on information. Includes Font Awesome 4.0.3 & Chart.js script. Overall design was inspired by the awesome work of Jack Lalley. Dribbble shots used in this demo comes from the designer Justin Mezzell.  	SUBSCRIBE:

name: Small – Dribbble Portfolio Theme
description: ArraySmall is a little theme focused in your latest dribbble shots. Thanks to the jibbble script, this theme allows you to show 8 shots on the front page. Works excellent as a vCard option.   	SUBSCRIBE:

name: Link – Bootstrap 3 Agency Theme
description: ArrayLink is a complete agency theme. Show your work with style and in a beautiful way. Create a handsome site with the 6 pages included in this theme. Includes Font Awesome 4, CSS Animation & more. Thanks to Soumyabrata Ghosh now Link have their Tumblr version available totally free.Theme Install: Check it out.Theme Demo: Check it out.Thanks to Tim Nicholson now Link have their WordPress version available totally free.Theme Information: Check it here  	SUBSCRIBE:

name: Spot – Freelance & Agency Theme
description: ArraySpot is flat & handsome theme. Designed for freelancers or small agencies, Spot looks awesome in your browser or mobile device. It comes with cool stuff like charts, pricing tables, font awesome 4.0 and more. With the great collaboration of GentsThemes, now you can get the WP version of this awesome theme. Grab it here!  	SUBSCRIBE:

name: Minimal – Dark Bootstrap 3 Theme
description: ArrayMinimal is a simple and small theme. Ideal for you contact page or minimal site. This theme was designed for those wanting something different  more than the habitual information page.   	SUBSCRIBE:

name: Munter – One Page Theme
description: ArrayMunter is a very handsome Bootstrap 3 theme. Comes with beautiful features like a fixed arrows navigation, a nice portfolio showcase and a smooth scroll.   	SUBSCRIBE:

name: Victoria – Simple vCard
description: ArrayA small and elegant vCard. Show your important information with style. Also, you can use it like a coming soon page.   	SUBSCRIBE:

name: Onassis – Agency One Page Theme
description: ArrayA one page theme ideal for agencies or freelancers. Beautifully crafted and with notable features like an off-canvas menu.   	SUBSCRIBE:

name: Kelvin – Resume Theme
description: ArrayA really good looking resume theme. Show your information with style. Take a look.   	SUBSCRIBE:

name: Pratt – App Landing Page
description: ArrayPratt is a simple App Landing Page. Really easy to use and modify. It works well for a Coming Soon Page.   	SUBSCRIBE:

name: Clean Blog
description: Clean blog is a carefully styled Bootstrap blog theme that is perfect for personal or company blogs. This theme features four HTML pages including a blog index, an about page, a sample post, and a contact page.

name: Agency
description: Agency is a stylish, one page Bootstrap theme for agencies and small businesses. The design of Agency is based off of the Golden PSD Theme by Mathavan Jaya. You can download the PSD verison of this theme at FreebiesXpress.com.

name: Freelancer
description: Freelancer is a one page Bootstrap portfolio theme for freelancers. This theme is built using the Flatly theme by Bootswatch.

name: Scrolling Nav
description: Scrolling Nav is a basic Bootstrap framework for creating smooth scrolling, one page websites.

name: Grayscale
description: Grayscale is a multipurpose, one page website theme featuring a dark layout along with smooth scrolling page animations.

name: SB Admin 2
description: SB Admin 2 Bootstrap admin theme, dashboard template, or webapp UI starter. The theme features a variety of custom jQuery plugins to add extended functionality past the built in Bootstrap UI features.

name: Landing Page
description: Landing Page is a responsive landing page theme for Bootstrap 3.

name: Shop Item
description: Shop Item is a basic, unstyled ecommerce template for Bootstrap ecommerce websites. This template can be used to display a single shop item within an online store.

name: Shop Homepage
description: Shop Homepage is a starter template for a Bootstrap based online store or ecommerce website.

name: Business Casual
description: Business Casual is a full website template for Bootstrap 3. It features four different HTML pages and a number of custom style components.

name: SB Admin
description: SB Admin is a free to download Bootstrap admin template. This template uses the defaul Bootstrap 3 styles along with a variety of powerful jQuery plugins to create a pwerful framework for creating admin panels, web apps, or back-end dashboards.

name: Portfolio Item
description: Portfolio Item is a basic Bootstrap template used to create single portfolio item pages on a Bootstrap based website.

name: Stylish Portfolio
description: Stylish Portfolio is a one page Bootstrap portfolio theme with off canvas navigation and smooth scrolling through content sections.

name: Simple Sidebar
description: Simple Sidebar is a basic sidebar menu page layout for Bootstrap websites with off canvas navigation on smaller screen sizes.

name: Modern Business
description: Modern Business is a fully loaded Bootstrap 3 website starter template. It includes 17 HTML pages along with a working PHP contact form. You can use this template to create larger, multipurpose websites using Bootstrap 3.

name: 4 Col Portfolio
description: 4 Col Portfolio is a basic, four column image grid ideal for featuring a large number of projects that do not require much detail. Adding image hover effects is highly recommended.

name: 3 Col Portfolio
description: 3 Col Portfolio is a simple, three column portfolio page grid that is ideal for showcasing a larger group of projects with minor details

name: 2 Col Portfolio
description: 2 Col Portfolio is a basic, unstyled portfolio grid template with a responsive, two column layout. This template is ideal for pages featuring a smaller number of projects with some details.

name: 1 Col Portfolio
description: 1 Col Portfolio is a single column portfolio page template. Each portfolio item includes an image, project title heading, a subheading, and a description block. This template is ideal for showcasing a smaller list of more detailed projects.

name: Full Width Pics
description: Full Width Pics is a unique Bootstrap starter template for a landing page or a one page website. It features full width image sections with an option to include a logo in the header along with other custom design elements.

name: Thumbnail Gallery
description: Thumbnail Gallery is a simple image gallery template for Bootstrap built websites. It features a 3x4 image grid with thumbnails.

name: The Big Picture
description: The Big Picture is an artistic, full screen background image template with a fixed bottom footer.

name: Small Business
description: Small Business is a landing page template for Bootstrap built small business websites.

name: Round About
description: Round About is a Bootstrap about page template featuring round images.

name: One Page Wonder
description: One Page Wonder is an unstyled Bootstrap 3 starter template for quickly creating one page websites in Bootstrap.

name: Logo Nav
description: Logo Nav is a Bootstrap 3 navigation template that replaces the default text in the navbar header with an image.

name: Heroic Features
description: Heroic features is an unstyled template featuring a hero unit as a header and a grid of feature boxes.

name: Half Slider
description: Half Slider is a half page height, full width image slider template for Bootstrap 3. This theme is great for creating landing pages or one page websites.

name: Full Slider
description: Full Slider is a full page image background slider built using the Bootstrap carousel. You can use this template to create one page websites, portfolio sites, and much more.

name: Full
description: Full is a Bootstrap 3 HTML starter template for creating pages with a fixed, full page image background.

name: Business Frontpage
description: Business Frontpage is a basic HTML starter template for creating a Bootstrap based website for a small business or other organization.

name: Blog Post
description: Blog Post is a simple Bootstrap starter template for creating blog posts within a Bootstrap built blog website.

name: Blog Home
description: Blog Home is an unstyled Bootstrap template you can use to quickly create a home page for a Bootstrap based blog website.

name: Bare
description: Bare is a basic Bootstrap 3 starter template that you can download, unzip, and use out of the box without having to change any file paths.

name: Cerulean
description: A calm blue sky

name: Cosmo
description: An ode to Metro

name: Cyborg
description: Jet black and electric blue

name: Darkly
description: Flatly in night mode

name: Flatly
description: Flat and modern

name: Journal
description: Crisp like a new sheet of paper

name: Lumen
description: Light and shadow

name: Paper
description: Material is the metaphor

name: Readable
description: Optimized for legibility

name: Sandstone
description: A touch of warmth

name: Simplex
description: Mini and minimalist

name: Slate
description: Shades of gunmetal gray

name: Spacelab
description: Silvery and sleek

name: Superhero
description: The brave and the blue

name: United
description: Ubuntu orange and unique font

name: Yeti
description: A friendly foundation
